item.title: Sample - cics_ims
item.description: Request the necessary columns for cics/ims workload analysis. Description Columns renamed and converted to string or boolean output: - cpu_critical Indicates whether the period is CPU critical or not. - stgcrit_implicit Indicates whether the period belongs to a service class that was assigned storage protection (storage critical). The service class was used in subsystem type CICSÂ® or IMS and the rule specified storage critical = yes. - pserver_type_name Describes the type of the server associated with the record, based on the bits in the field ‘pserver_type’.

item.title: Field - class_period
item.description: service class name and period Map: SMF99_S2_PER_MAP Based on: srv_class_name, period_num Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return srv_class_name +'.' + period_num

item.description: Period is managed using EWLM performance data. Map: SMF99_S2_PER_MAP Based on: flags Description Period is managed using EWLM performance data. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field flags.

item.title: Field - flags
item.description: Flags Map: SMF99_S2_PER_MAP Based on: SMF99_FLAGS Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description needs_sysplex_help 0 Period experienced some type of delay within the sysplex during last policy adjustment interval cpu_critical 1 Period is cpu critical stgcrit_implicit 2 period belongs to a service class that was assigned storage protection (stg critical) in the active service policy. The service class was used in subsystem type CICS or IMS and the rule specified storage critical = yes.

item.title: Field - flags2
item.description: Flags Map: SMF99_S2_PER_MAP Based on: SMF99_FLAGS2 Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description inelighonorpriority 0 Specialty engine work in this period is ineligible for “Honor Priority Processing”, i.e. it will not be offloaded to CPs for help processing. iscappedbytrg 1 At least one TRG with a capacity maximum is associated with this period iscappedbysoletrg 2 Exactly one TRG with a capacity maximum is associated with this period cpucrit_implicit 3 Service class period implicitly designated CPU critical

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: System indicator: Bit 0 reserved, Bit 1 subtypes utilized, Bit 2 reserved, Bits 3-6 version indicators, Bit 7 reserved Record: SMF99S2 Based on: SMF99FLG Description System indicator: Bit 0 reserved, Bit 1 subtypes utilized, Bit 2 reserved, Bits 3-6 version indicators, Bit 7 reserved Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description stu 1 Subtypes utilized

item.title: Field - gav_area
item.description: Not available Map: SMF99_S2_PER_MAP Based on: SMF99_GAV_AREA Description Not available

item.title: Field - gav_array

Map: SMF99_S2_PER_MAP Based on: flags Description period belongs to a service class that was assigned storage protection (stg critical) in the active service policy. The service class was used in subsystem type CICS or IMS and the rule specified storage critical = yes.
